job_description.job_summary: When requested by staff you must turn on their computers by pressing the I/O button
job_description.background:
Must have minimum 5 years experience turning computers on
- skills in turning computers off not required (already hiring a seperate person for this position)

details.description: Nothing in life is more serious than turning a computer on

job_description.important_notice: Please send your application with a covering letter to the requested email address
